public class ServerConnection
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable, SocketConnection

A threaded connection class to maintain the conneciton to the server

Version:
0.8
Author:
Joseph Monti countjoe@users.sourceforge.net

                    java.lang.String n,
                    java.lang.String p)
handles a change in channels

Specified by:
channel in interface SocketConnection
Parameters:
nc - true if a new channel, false when you have succesfully changed channels so clear all user lists and add yourself; should be recieving a list of any connected users in this channel shortly
n - the name of the channel
p - should be null, not used here
